00023 #ifndef UVM_IDS_H
00024 #define UVM_IDS_H
00025 
00026 #include "sysc/utils/sc_report.h"
00027 
00028 
00029 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 // Report ids (uvm) following the style of SystemC kernel message reporting.
00031 //
00032 // Report ids in the range of 1-100.
00033 
00034 // If SystemC kernel is modified to be aware of the UVM message ids,
00035 // then sysc/utils/sc_utils_ids.cpp has to include this file, and 
00036 // has to define UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE suitably with an offset added 
00037 // to the message id such that the id does not clash with any id 
00038 // already used by the SystemC kernel.  
00039 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 
00041 #ifndef UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE
00042 
00043 
00044 #if (defined(UVM_IDS_CPP) && !defined(NC_SYSTEMC))
00045 
00046 #define UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(id, unused, text) \
00047     namespace sc_core { extern const char id[] = text; }
00048 #else
00049 #define UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(id, unused, text) \
00050     namespace sc_core { extern const char id[]; }
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 #endif
00054 //
00055 // UVM-SC messages
00056 //
00057 
00058 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_MULTIPLE_STOP_PROCS_    , 1, \
00059         "uvm_component has multiple children named 'stop'; did you mistakenly declare 'SC_THREAD(stop)'?")
00060 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_INDEX_, 2, \
00061         "uvm_packer unpack_index > pack_index")
00062 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_, 3, \
00063         "uvm_packer unpack_object failed")
00064 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_CREATOR_NOT_FOUND_, 4, \
00065         "uvm creator not found for type")

00067         "uvm creator is not an object creator")

00069         "uvm creator is not a component creator")

00071         "uvm type override already exists")
